title: Zachman Framework for Enterprise Architecture
description: The Zachman Framework is a structured tool used in enterprise architecture to organize and understand complex business systems using a 6x6 matrix

Welcome to
# Zachman International
and
# The FEAC Institute
Competency based enterprise architecture education through hands-on practice and active mentorship. 
[Zachman Course Overview](https://zachman-feac.com/zachman/zcea-overview)[FEAC Course Overview](https://zachman-feac.com/feac/certification-comparison)
![Zachman Courses](https://zachman-feac.com/images/2021/10/05/blank-bg.jpg)
### Zachman Courses
Let John and our faculty mentor you in the Zachman Framework™. You will get premium, exclusive access to all the major advancements made in the practice of Enterprise Architecture through the Zachman Framework.
[VIEW ZACHMAN COURSES >](https://zachman-feac.com/training-dates/category/5)
![FEAC Courses](https://zachman-feac.com/images/2021/10/05/blank-bg.jpg)
### FEAC Courses
Each certification delivers a different level of mastery. Whether you need to get going right away, or you need the theory to tailor your program, or you want to build an entire EA practice, we have the right program for you.
[VIEW FEAC COURSES >](https://zachman-feac.com/training-dates/category/5)
![Resources](https://zachman-feac.com/images/2021/10/05/blank-bg.jpg)
### Resources
From our [Zachman - FEAC blog](https://zachman-feac.com/index.php?option=com_zoo&view=frontpage&layout=frontpage&Itemid=995) to [EA Articles and References](https://zachman-feac.com/zachman/about-the-zachman-framework). Also visit our [EA Zone](https://zachman-feac.com/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=147&Itemid=1248) and [Video Library](https://zachman-feac.com/index.php?option=com_spsimpleportfolio&view=items&Itemid=997). We have all the resources you need to achieve your certification.
Become the expert in your organization.
## OUR CERTIFICATION COURSES
Zachman International and FEAC Institute offer multiple class environments to meet your needs.
![Zachman & FEACLIVE IN-PERSON CLASSES](https://zachman-feac.com/images/2021/10/01/zachman-feac-in-person-classes.jpg)
###  Zachman & FEACLIVE IN-PERSON CLASSES
8 Different Certification Tracks  
50+ Scheduled Classes Available
![Zachman & FEACVirtual Classes](https://zachman-feac.com/images/2021/10/01/zachman-feac-virtual-classes.jpg)
###  Zachman & FEACVirtual Classes
Live-stream classes.  
Save on travel expenses!
![Zachman & FEACSelf-Paced Classes](https://zachman-feac.com/images/2021/10/01/zachman-feac-self-paced-classes.jpg)
###  Zachman & FEACSelf-Paced Classes
Busy schedule?   
Try our virtual university!

<p> </p>

<p> </p>

Also visit our [EA Zone](https://zachman-feac.com/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=147&Itemid=1248) and [Video Library](https://zachman-feac.com/index.php?option=com_spsimpleportfolio&view=items&Itemid=997).
